p: The risk of disease in Yantian district was the largest when only the spatiotemporal effects were analyzed. In Fig 4, from the spatial scale, we can see that the high-risk areas from 2012 to 2015 were mainly concentrated in northern Shenzhen (Longgang district, Pingshan district). The risks of disease in Longgang district and Pingshan district decreased, while the risk of disease in Baoan district increased.
